atk-s0510a31:3: 55. Sattamāpadāne samayaṃ agamāsahanti samūhaṃ samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a31:4: 62.Abbudanirabbudānīti ‘‘pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ abbudaṃ, abbudasatasahassānaṃ sataṃ nirabbuda’’nti vuttattā āyunā abbudanirabbudāni gatamahāāyuvantā manujādhipā cakkavattino khattiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā kappānaṃ pañcavīsasahassamhi āsiṃsu ahesunti attho. Aṭṭhamanavamadasamāpadānāni pākaṭānevāti.
